formdata.value: {"GPA": 8.7, "current_year": 4, "major_subjects": ["Machine Learning", "Deep Learning", "Data Structures", "Algorithms", "Computer Vision", "Natural Language Processing"], "extracurriculars": ["AI/ML Club", "Coding Club", "Research Group"], "expected_graduation": "2025"}
I am a final year B.Tech student specializing in AI/ML. I want to transition into a data scientist role at top tech companies. Can you help me identify skill gaps and provide a learning roadmap?

{"GPA": 8.9, "current_year": 3, "major_subjects": ["Cognitive Psychology", "Social Psychology", "Research Methods", "Statistical Methods", "Abnormal Psychology", "Counseling Psychology"], "extracurriculars": ["Psychology Society", "Mental Health Club", "Research Group", "Volunteer Work"], "expected_graduation": "2025"}
I am pursuing BA Psychology and want to build a career in clinical psychology or UX research. I am confused about which path to choose and what additional skills I need to develop. Can you guide me?
